amendatorysection.catchline: Tractor model testing order; discrimination prohibited; exception.
amendatorysection.para: Except when a temporary permit has been issued pursuant to subsection (4) of section 2-2701, tractors shall be tested by the board in the order in which they are presented for such tests, and no discrimination shall be made for or against any person in any manner whatsoever. Complaints alleging a violation of this section shall be heard by the department.
